price: Or did they create the heavens and earth? Rather, they are not certain in faith.
arabic: أَمۡ خَلَقُواْ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
